alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 4:42PM EDT until August 27 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... North central Richland County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 442 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Carolina, or 8 miles south of Springdale, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Lake Carolina, Killian, Blythewood, Smallwood, and Cedar Creek Fire Station. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 22 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
